activities: Platinum IDS is a Litigation Support provider, focusing on aiding the international legal community at large in the realm of document management.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

recoursemech: DISPUTE RESOLUTION: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to the Platinum IDS Privacy Office at the address given below. Platinum IDS will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information by reference to the principles contained in this Policy. For complaints that cannot be resolved between Platinum IDS and the complainant, Platinum IDS has agreed to participate in the following dispute resolution procedures in the investigation and resolution of complaints: BBB EU SAFE HARBOR.
